full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLO SBYONG SNYAN BRGYUD CHEN MO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @084A *, ,BLO SBYONG SNYAN BRGYUD KYI TSIG RNAMS YI GE NYUNG DU'I SGO NAS BKROL BA 'DI, ,THEG PA MCHOG GI RNAL 'BYOR PA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL NAS, BTZUN PA THOGS MED KYIS CHOS RJER DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,DE LTAR CHOS RJE PAS MDZAD PA'I 'GREL PA NYID DKYUS JI LTA BA BZHIN BRIS SHING, ,DE DAG GI THAD SO THAD SOR NYAMS KHRID DAM RGYAS PAR GSUNG PA'I DUS NA GTAM RGYUD DANG, ,YID CHES KYI LUNG SBYOR MDZAD PA DKYUS MA MED PA, @084B RNAMS JI LTAR GSUNGS TSOD LTAR BRUNGS NA NI HA CANG YI GE MANG BAS 'JIGS SHING BRJOD PAR YANG MI NUS LA, ,RAGS RIM RANG GI BLO LA ZIN TSOD KYI GSUNG SPROS RNAMS SKABS DE DANG DER SBYAR TE, BLO DMAN RANG NYID BRJED PAS 'JIGS PA KHO NAS YI GER BKOD DE, ,CHOS RJE PA NYID LA GZIGS PA PHUL ZHING ZHUS DAG MDZAD PA 'DI CHOS RJE RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE NYID KYI BKA' 'BANGS RNAMS KYI THA CHUNGSU GYUR BA'I SPRANG PO SNYOMS LAS PA DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,GSUNG RAB KUN GYI SNYING PO'I SNYING PO LAM MCHOG THEG CHEN BLO SBYONG GI ,GSUNG SGROS RGYA MTSO'I ZIN BRIS 'DI LA BDAG BLO NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS NA, ,GSUNG DBYANGS YAN LAG DRUG BCU LA SOGS YON TAN RGYA MTSOS 'BYOR GYUR BA,   GSUNG GI DPAR PHYUG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS SOGS 'PHAGS PA RNAMS LA SO SOR BSHAGS, ,DPAL LDAN YON TAN KUN GYI 'BYUNG GNAS RGYAL BA'I RGYAL MTSAN TSAB CHOS KYI RJE, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA'I GSUNG SGROS ZIN PA JI BZHIN MDOR BSDUS 'DI, ,DPAL ,'GRO KUN GLING BZHI'I MUN PA KUN BSAL NAS, ,THUB DBANG BSTAN PA'I PAD TSAL RAB TU RGYAS BYED SHOG ,RNAM DAG BSTAN 'DZIN LHUN PO JI SNYED KYANG, ,RNAM PA KUN TU MI MTHUN RI TSOGS GZHAN, ,RNAM MANG YON
